At Dairybliss, your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.
1. Information We Collect: We collect basic user information such as name, phone number, address, email, and order history. This information helps us deliver products to your doorstep, manage your account, and provide personalized offers.
2. How We Use Your Information: Your data is used solely for order fulfillment, customer support, and app improvements. We may send occasional promotional messages related to Dairybliss, but you can opt-out anytime.
3. Data Sharing: We do not sell or rent your personal data. Your details may be shared with delivery partners solely for the purpose of completing your orders.
4. Data Security: We use industry-standard encryption, secure servers, and limited-access databases to protect your information.
5. Account Control: You may update or delete your account information at any time via the app. For permanent deletion, please contact our support team.
6. Cookies and Tracking: Our app may use cookies or device identifiers to enhance user experience and understand app usage. No personal data is shared via these tools.
7. Third-Party Services: Our app may contain links or integrations with third-party services (like payment gateways). We encourage you to review their privacy policies.
8. Changes to This Policy: We may occasionally update this policy. Any changes will be communicated via the app or email.
9. Contact Us: For any privacy-related questions or requests, please contact us at support@dairybliss.com or call +91-9876543210.
By using Dairybliss, you consent to this Privacy Policy.
